pages.text: hananim-ui jongbogdeul-eun geugeos(jangnoe)i majdah-eun umul-eul masini geudeul-eun geugeos(umul)eul pungseonghi gilleonaedeola
geudeul-eun maengse-ui mal-eul junsuhamyeo, saagham-i mol-achil geunal-eul dulyeowohago
bul-uhan jawa goawa polo-ege jasin-i aechaghaneun eumsig-eul judeola
uliga geudaedeul-ege eumsig-eul jum-eun ojig hananim-ui eolgul-eul wiham-imyeo ulineun geudaedeullobuteo bosang-ina gamsado wonhaji anhnola
sillo ulineun eolgul-eul jjipulyeoya hal heomnanhan nal-e uliui junim-eul dulyeowohanola
geulihayeo hananimkkeseoneun geunal-ui saagham-eulobuteo geudeul-eul guhae jusyeoss-eumyeo geudeul-i pogeunhamgwa jeulgeoum-eul yeongjeobtolog haejusyeossnola
geuligo geubunkkeseoneun geudeul-ui innaee daehae bosanghasyeoss-euni cheonguggwa bidan-ila
geugos-eseo geudeul-eun chayang-i deuliwojin chimdae wie mom-eul gidaego, geugos-eseo geudeul-eun taeyang-eul boji anh-eumyeo doenchuwido eobsnola
geugos-ui geuneul-eun geudeul-ege deuliwojyeo iss-eumyeo geugos-ui gwasil-eun (ttagiga) maeu suwolhaejyeo issnola
eun-eulo doen geuleusgwa tumyeonghan keob-i geudeul juwileul doni
eun-eulo doen tumyeonghan keob-euloseo geudeul-eun geugeos(keob)eul jeogdanghan yang-eulo jojeolhanola
geuligo geudeul-eun geugos-eseo suljan-eulo masil geoliga jueojineunde geugeos-e seokk-in geos-eun saeng-gang-imyeo
geugos-eseo 'salsabil'ilaneun ileum-ui umul-eul masinola
yeongsaeng-ui eolin-ideul-i geudeul saileul doni geudaega geudeul-eul boass-eul ttaeneun geudeul-eul heut-eojin jinjuallo saeng-gaghal geos-imyeo
geugos-eseo jeongnyeong geudaega bol geos-eun anlaghamgwa widaehan jugwon-ila

geudeul wie geolchyeojin geos-eun budeuleoun nogsaeg bidan osgwa dutumhan myeongjubut-iimyeo geudeul-eun eun-eulo doen paljjilo chijangdoel geos-ila. geuligo geudeul junimkkeseoneun geudeul-ege cheongjeonghan eumlyoleul jusil geos-ila
“sillo igeos-eun geudaedeul-eul wihan bosang-euloseo geudaedeul-ui nolyeog-eun bodabbad-assnola”
jinsillo naneun geudaeege kkulan-eul dangyejeog-eulo naelyeossnola
geuleoni geudaeneun geudae junim-ui pangyeol-e innaehago geudeul jung-e joejisneun jana bulsinhaneun jaleul ttaleuji malla
geuligo ileun najgwa neuj-eun naj-e geudae junim-ui ileum-eul tteoollimyeo
